TopicTitle: Build space elevator that gets taller with science

Articles.Content: You could have a space elevator, and it costs science to make it taller. You would launch rockets from a platform at the top of the elevator. As the elevator got higher, launching would be easier, until it gets to keostationary orbit and you don't even have to launch anymore.
Well, let's not go overly unrealistic on this. It would be fine to have an ''elevator'' for launching from greater altitudes, but it should only save you up to 5000 meters. Which is still big.
